insights.content: File-count reality dwarfs the structured system: Work 180,303 files, Personal capture 92,926, Personal reflection 42, Backup 427,553, tools duplicated across `00-09_System/01_Tools` (155,769) and `/Volumes/VRAM/tools` (153,246); >1,009,872 known files overall.

insights.content: Search coverage is narrow: `00-09_System/00_Index/search.db` holds 181,594 records (Work 177,167, System 4,385, Personal 42) and excludes `30-39_Personal/31_Capture` and `/Volumes/VRAM/Backup`, leaving the largest sources invisible to queries.

insights.title: The "Great Divergence": Stream vs. Structure
insights.content: The "Great Divergence": Stream vs. Structure

insights.title: Behavior (The Stream): Ron captures *everything* v...
insights.content: Behavior (The Stream): Ron captures *everything* via AI-native tools (`31.02_limitless`, `31.03_rewind`) and generates massive amounts of meeting data. This data is temporal, flowing, and huge (~92k files).

insights.title: System (The Structure): The VRAM folders (`40-49_F...
insights.content: System (The Structure): The VRAM folders (`40-49_Family`, `30-39_Personal`) are static, hierarchical buckets waiting to be filled manually.

insights.title: Result: The Structure remains empty ("Ghost Town")...
insights.content: Result: The Structure remains empty ("Ghost Town") because the friction to move data from the Stream is too high. The "substance" of his life is trapped in the "Shadow System" (Backup/Capture).

insights.content: Topic prevalence across `.md` files: marketing (1,218 files), podcast (1,418), LinkedIn (1,311), events (1,271), sponsor (456), contract (768), budget (673), proposal (380), invoice (215), action item (193), next steps (195).

insights.title: **Work as the Universal Container:** Family/health...
insights.content: **Work as the Universal Container:** Family/health/stress mentions appear in Work transcripts while Family/Personal areas remain empty. The system architecture assumes separated domains, but Ron‚Äôs reality is integrated.

insights.title: **Capture ‚â† Synthesis:** 92k+ capture files and 4k...
insights.content: **Capture ‚â† Synthesis:** 92k+ capture files and 4k+ meeting transcripts vs. ~42 reflection notes; this is a write‚Äëonly memory system.

insights.title: **Metadata fragmentation:** `.md` transcripts and ...
insights.content: **Metadata fragmentation:** `.md` transcripts and `.json` metadata are split, causing blind spots (content without metadata or metadata without readable content).

insights.title: **Search bias:** `search.db` covers Work and Syste...
insights.content: **Search bias:** `search.db` covers Work and System; it ignores Capture/Backup, skewing insights toward Work and hiding personal/family/health signals.

insights.title: **Validation bottleneck:** Triad‚Äôs insights are pl...
insights.content: **Validation bottleneck:** Triad‚Äôs insights are plentiful (490+) but none cross the actionable threshold; the missing piece is a short, human validation loop.
